meanings.definition: A person who creates or designs fashionable clothing or accessories.
meanings.sent1: The talented styler designed a stunning dress for the fashion show.
meanings.sent2: The styler showcased their new collection at the designer boutique.
meanings.sent3: The creative styler added unique patterns to the latest scarf design.
meanings.sent4: She was a true styler, weaving magic into every piece of clothing she made.
meanings.sent5: The styler's creations lit up the runway with their elegance and charm.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used to style hair.
meanings.sent1: The hair styler helped create beautiful curls for the special occasion.
meanings.sent2: She used the styler to straighten her hair before the party.
meanings.sent3: The automatic styler made hairstyling a breeze in the busy salon.
meanings.sent4: With the hair styler, she transformed her look in minutes.
meanings.sent5: The styler's heat settings allowed for versatile hair styling options.

meanings.definition: A software program or application used to customize the appearance of documents or websites.
meanings.sent1: The graphic designer used the styler to enhance the website's layout.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the font size using the text styler feature in the program.
meanings.sent3: The website styler tool made editing the webpage a fun task.
meanings.sent4: With the document styler, she gave the report a professional look.
meanings.sent5: The software's styler function allowed for easy customization of the design.
